description: The true identity of Pauline Botting's father was hidden from her for years.
title: Jersey Occupation: 'My mother slept with the enemy'
title_page: Jersey Occupation: 'My mother slept with the enemy' - BBC News
maintext: Jersey and the Bailiwick of Guernsey were the only part of the British Isles to be occupied by the German forces in World War Two, and remained so until their liberation in 1945.
